Betting now! It was a misunderstanding by the MC! Thinking he was in a love triangle with the other guy for the girl. Only turns out HE was the centerpiece of the Love Triangle (The other guy was "more interested in him" then the girl! And the two were in competition for HIS affections! LL love that type of twist where the guy thought the handsome guy wanted to bone his girl when in reality he wanted to "bone him!" With his girl and the guy's relationship being no different then "two girl competing for the same guy while still friendly with each other outside of trying to get with the guy of course, only getting territorial with each other in that regard! I feel for pretty boy not know he's "Crush" is VERY Heterosexual! I was in the same boat when a Guy I was good friends with in HS came out to me revealing his feelings for me.......and I was very "SUPER INTO GIRLS" so it was akward! Luckly I handled it well and peaceful! Honestly my tastes are only Bisexual when it come to Porn LOL)
